name: Katy_Mullen
text:
Katy Mullen
Katy Mullen was the secretary to James Packard.
Following the Blizzard of 1889, Mullen wrote that many coffins were being held at the Opera House, stating that she would never again see a performance at the venue. She went on to describe the conditions of some of the bodies and the effect the blizzard had on Packard.
